name: Photon
description: Photon is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its forest green box and rocket arms and legs, Photon stands out in any crowd. Its cat buttons add a touch of whimsy to its design, while its laser screen provides powerful visual displays. Photon is a versatile and intelligent robot, with the ability to analyze and interpret complex data. Its advanced technology and sleek design make it a valuable asset to any team.
